    android.gameengine.icadroids.alarms.IAlarm

extends java.lang.Object
implements android.gameengine.icadroids.alarms.IAlarm

      • Gun

        public Gun(SugarWars theGame,
           int cooldown)
        Initialed a new Gun
        Parameters:
        theGame - the game where this gun exists
        cooldown - the cooldown in ms between shots

    • Method Detail

      • fire

        public abstract void fire(android.gameengine.icadroids.objects.MoveableGameObject shooter)
        This function is called when the gun will shoot. Most implementation will create a new Projectile and add the projectile to the game

      • isInCooldown

        protected boolean isInCooldown()
        This will check if the gun is in cooldown mode
        Returns:
        whether or not in cooldown

      • startCooldown

        protected void startCooldown()
        Start the cooldown. You can check if the cooldown is done using isInCooldown()

      • triggerAlarm

        public void triggerAlarm(int alarmID)
        When overriding, call the super if you want to use build-in cooldown
        Specified by:
        triggerAlarm in interface android.gameengine.icadroids.alarms.IAlarm
        Parameters:
        alarmID - id 0 is used for cooldown
